thread.title: Robert
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text: I ordered a glass globe to fit on a small deco lamp (that was buried in a closet for decades without a glass shade). The package arrived quickly and well packed. The amber colored globe is BEAUTIFUL, nicer than the original shade; rich in color and detail; plus fits well. I am very pleased! And it is nice to use the lamp again, which looks better than ever.
